predictions.tooltip:
Prediction Markets
Real-money forecasting markets:
  • Prices reflect crowd probability estimates
  • Higher volume = more reliable signal
  • Geopolitical and current events focus
Source: Polymarket (polymarket.com)

strategicPosture.infoTooltip:
Methodology

Aggregates military aircraft and naval vessels by theater.

  • Normal: Baseline activity
  • Elevated: Above threshold (50+ aircraft)
  • Critical: High concentration (100+ aircraft)

Strike Capable: Tankers + AWACS + Fighters present in sufficient numbers for sustained operations.
strategicPosture.connectingStreams: Connecting to live ADS-B & AIS streams...
strategicPosture.initialLoadNote: Initial load takes 30-60 seconds as tracking data accumulates
strategicPosture.acquiringDesc: Connecting to ADS-B network for military flight data. This may take 30-60 seconds on first load.
strategicPosture.rateLimitedDesc: OpenSky API has request limits. The panel will automatically retry in a few minutes, or you can try again now.
strategicPosture.rateLimitedTip: Tip: Peak hours (UTC 12:00-20:00) often see higher limits.
strategicPosture.staleWarning: Using cached data - live feed temporarily unavailable

cii.infoTooltip:
Methodology
  • Unrest: civil disorder & protests
  • Conflict: armed conflict intensity
  • Security: military flights/vessels over territory
  • Information: news velocity and focal point correlation
  • Hotspot proximity boost (strategic locations)
U:C:S:I values show component scores. Focal Point Detection correlates news entities with map signals for accurate scoring.

insights.noStories: No breaking or multi-source stories yet
insights.infoTooltip:
AI-Powered Analysis
‚Ä¢ World Brief: AI summary (Groq/OpenRouter)
‚Ä¢ Sentiment: News tone analysis
‚Ä¢ Velocity: Fast-moving stories
‚Ä¢ Focal Points: Correlates news entities with map signals (military, protests, outages)
Desktop only ‚Ä¢ Powered by Llama 3.3 + Focal Point Detection
insights.aiFlowCloudDesc: Send headlines to cloud for AI summarization (recommended)
insights.aiFlowBrowserDesc: Run AI locally in your browser
insights.aiFlowBrowserWarn: This will download approximately 250MB of data to your computer
insights.aiFlowOllamaCtaDesc: Download the desktop app for Ollama support
insights.insightsDisabledHint: Enable providers using the gear button above

cascade.selectInfrastructureHint: Select infrastructure to analyze cascade impact
cascade.infoTooltip:
Cascade Analysis Models infrastructure dependencies:
  • Subsea cables, pipelines, ports, chokepoints
  • Select infrastructure to simulate failure
  • Shows affected countries and capacity loss
  • Identifies redundant routes
Data from TeleGeography and industry sources.

strategicRisk.enableDataSources: Enable data sources to begin monitoring.
strategicRisk.infoTooltip:
Methodology Composite score (0-100) blending:
  • 50% Country Instability (top 5 weighted)
  • 30% Geographic convergence zones
  • 20% Infrastructure incidents
Auto-refreshes every 5 minutes.

techReadiness.infoTooltip:
Global Tech Readiness
Composite score (0-100) based on World Bank data:

Metrics shown:
üåê Internet Users (% of population)
üì± Mobile Subscriptions (per 100 people)
üî¨ R&D Expenditure (% of GDP)

Weights: R&D (35%), Internet (30%), Broadband (20%), Mobile (15%)

‚Äî = No recent data available
Source: World Bank Open Data (2019-2024)

populationExposure.infoTooltip:
Population Exposure Estimates Estimated population within event impact radius. Based on WorldPop country density data.
  • Conflict: 50km radius
  • Earthquake: 100km radius
  • Flood: 100km radius
  • Wildfire: 30km radius

satelliteFires.infoTooltip: NASA FIRMS VIIRS satellite thermal detections across monitored conflict regions. High-intensity = brightness >360K & confidence >80%.

ucdpEvents.infoTooltip:
UCDP Georeferenced Events Event-level conflict data from Uppsala University.
  • State-Based: Government vs rebel group
  • Non-State: Armed group vs armed group
  • One-Sided: Violence against civilians
Deaths shown as best estimate (low-high range). ACLED duplicates are filtered out automatically.

displacement.infoTooltip:
UNHCR Displacement Data Global refugee, asylum seeker, and IDP counts from UNHCR.
  • Origins: Countries people flee FROM
  • Hosts: Countries hosting refugees
  • Crisis badges: >1M | High: >500K displaced
Data updates yearly. CC BY 4.0 license.

climate.infoTooltip:
Climate Anomaly Monitor Temperature and precipitation deviations from 30-day baseline. Data from Open-Meteo (ERA5 reanalysis).
  • Extreme: >5¬∞C or >80mm/day deviation
  • Moderate: >3¬∞C or >40mm/day deviation
Monitors 15 conflict/disaster-prone zones.

gdeltIntel.infoTooltip:
GDELT Intelligence Real-time global news monitoring:
  • Curated topic categories (conflicts, cyber, etc.)
  • Articles from 100+ languages translated
  • Updates every 15 minutes
Source: GDELT Project (gdeltproject.org)

investments.infoTooltip: Database of Saudi Arabia and UAE foreign direct investments in global critical infrastructure. Click a row to fly to the investment on the map.

prediction.infoTooltip:
Prediction Markets Real-money forecasting markets:
  • Prices reflect crowd probability estimates
  • Higher volume = more reliable signal
  • Geopolitical and current events focus
Source: Polymarket (polymarket.com)

apt.description: Advanced Persistent Threat group with state-level capabilities. Known for sophisticated cyber operations targeting critical infrastructure, government, and defense sectors.

nuclear.description: Nuclear facility under monitoring. Strategic importance for regional security and non-proliferation concerns.

irradiator.subtitle: Industrial Gamma Irradiator Facility
irradiator.description: Industrial irradiation facility using Cobalt-60 or Cesium-137 sources for medical device sterilization, food preservation, or material processing. Source: IAEA DIIF Database.

cable.subtitle: Undersea Fiber Optic Cable
cable.description: Undersea telecommunications cable carrying international internet traffic. These fiber optic cables form the backbone of global internet connectivity, transmitting over 95% of intercontinental data.

repairShip.note: Repair vessel tracking indicates active deployment toward fault site.
repairShip.description: Repair ship tracking indicates active deployment in support of undersea cable restoration.

militaryVessel.heading: HEADING
militaryVessel.approximatePosition: Position approximate ‚Äî based on USNI weekly report, not real-time AIS.
militaryVessel.darkDescription: ‚ö† Vessel has gone dark - AIS signal lost. May indicate sensitive operations.

spaceport.description: Strategic space launch facility. Launch cadence and orbit access capabilities are key geopolitical indicators.

prediction_leads_news.whyItMatters: Prediction markets often price in information before it becomes news‚Äîtraders may have early access to developments.
prediction_leads_news.actionableInsight: Monitor for breaking news in the next 1-6 hours that could explain the market move.
prediction_leads_news.confidenceNote: Higher confidence if multiple prediction markets move in same direction.

news_leads_markets.whyItMatters: News is breaking faster than markets are reacting‚Äîpotential mispricing opportunity.
news_leads_markets.actionableInsight: Watch for market catch-up as algorithms and traders digest the news.
news_leads_markets.confidenceNote: Stronger signal if news is from Tier 1 wire services.

silent_divergence.whyItMatters: Market moving significantly without any identifiable news catalyst‚Äîpossible insider knowledge, algorithmic trading, or unreported development.
silent_divergence.actionableInsight: Investigate alternative data sources; news may emerge later explaining the move.
silent_divergence.confidenceNote: Lower confidence as cause is unknown‚Äîtreat as early warning, not confirmed intelligence.

velocity_spike.whyItMatters: A story is accelerating across multiple news sources‚Äîindicates growing significance and potential for market/policy impact.
velocity_spike.actionableInsight: This topic warrants immediate attention; expect official statements or market reactions.
velocity_spike.confidenceNote: Higher confidence with more sources; check if Tier 1 sources are among them.

keyword_spike.whyItMatters: A term is appearing at significantly higher frequency than its baseline across multiple sources, indicating a developing story.
keyword_spike.actionableInsight: Review related headlines and AI summary, then correlate with country instability and market moves.
keyword_spike.confidenceNote: Confidence increases with stronger baseline multiplier and broader source diversity.

convergence.whyItMatters: Multiple independent source types confirming same event‚Äîcross-validation increases likelihood of accuracy.
convergence.actionableInsight: Treat this as high-confidence intelligence; triangulation reduces false positive risk.
convergence.confidenceNote: Very high confidence when wire + government + intel sources align.

triangulation.whyItMatters: The "authority triangle" (wire services, government sources, intel specialists) are aligned‚Äîthis is the gold standard for breaking news confirmation.
triangulation.actionableInsight: This is actionable intelligence; expect market/policy reactions imminently.
triangulation.confidenceNote: Highest confidence signal in the system‚Äîmultiple authoritative sources agree.

flow_drop.whyItMatters: Physical commodity flow disruption detected‚Äîsupply constraints often precede price spikes.
flow_drop.actionableInsight: Monitor energy commodity prices; assess supply chain exposure.
flow_drop.confidenceNote: Confidence depends on disruption duration and alternative supply availability.

flow_price_divergence.whyItMatters: Supply disruption news is not yet reflected in commodity prices‚Äîpotential information edge.
flow_price_divergence.actionableInsight: Either markets are slow to react, or the disruption is less significant than reported.
flow_price_divergence.confidenceNote: Medium confidence‚Äîmarkets may have better information than news reports.

geo_convergence.whyItMatters: Multiple news events clustering around same geographic location‚Äîpotential escalation or coordinated activity.
geo_convergence.actionableInsight: Increase monitoring priority for this region; correlate with satellite/AIS data if available.
geo_convergence.confidenceNote: Higher confidence if events span multiple source types and time periods.

explained_market_move.whyItMatters: Market move has clear news catalyst‚Äîno mystery, price action reflects known information.
explained_market_move.actionableInsight: Understand the narrative driving the move; assess if reaction is proportional.
explained_market_move.confidenceNote: High confidence‚Äînews and price action are correlated.

hotspot_escalation.whyItMatters: Geopolitical hotspot showing significant escalation based on news activity, country instability, geographic convergence, and military presence.
hotspot_escalation.actionableInsight: Increase monitoring priority; assess downstream impacts on infrastructure, markets, and regional stability.
hotspot_escalation.confidenceNote: Confidence weighted by multiple data sources‚Äînews (35%), country instability (25%), geo-convergence (25%), military activity (15%).

sector_cascade.whyItMatters: Market movement is cascading across related sectors‚Äîindicates systemic reaction to a catalyzing event.
sector_cascade.actionableInsight: Identify the primary catalyst; assess exposure across correlated assets.
sector_cascade.confidenceNote: Higher confidence when multiple sectors move with similar velocity and direction.

military_surge.whyItMatters: Military transport activity significantly above baseline‚Äîindicates potential deployment, humanitarian operation, or force projection.
military_surge.actionableInsight: Correlate with regional news; assess nearby base activity and naval movements.
military_surge.confidenceNote: Higher confidence with sustained activity over multiple hours and diverse aircraft types.

alerts.indexRose: Instability index rose from {{from}} to {{to}} ({{change}}). Driver: {{driver}}
alerts.indexFell: Instability index fell from {{from}} to {{to}} ({{change}}). Driver: {{driver}}
